content: I'm not capable of experiencing emotions or feelings, but i'm sure you will have a great time no matter which eco-friendly lodge or hotel you choose in costa rica. all the options i suggested offer unique experiences that are mindful of the environment and local communities. you can also consider which location and activities appeal most to you, as each ecolodge or hotel has its own unique features and activities that cater to different interests. feel free to ask me anything else you might need.
